snippet: LEAD: Pacific Bell, the telephone operating subsidiary of the Pacific Telesis Group, said that the California Public Utilities Commission had approved an agreement allowing lower prices for certain telephone services....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Pacific Bell, the telephone operating subsidiary of the Pacific Telesis Group, said that the California Public Utilities Commission had approved an agreement allowing lower prices for certain telephone services.

headline.main: Price Cuts Backed For Pacific Bell

byline.original: Special to the New York Times
